resources:
Football Scores Football Scores : Single Match Football Scores : Multiple Matches Football Scores : Multiple Matches #Football_Scores Settings Today Yesterday Tomorrow = Share About
This Application get Football Matches Score for the Premier League,Seria A,Bundesliga,Primera Division and the Uefa Champions League. All Matches data are acquired from football-data.org free API. All team Logos are acquired from http://hdlogo.wordpress.com/ upon requesting permission form the owner. The original version of this app was created by Yahia Khalid Ibn El Walid Ahmed, and a modified version is given to students in the Udacity Android Nanodegree program. To report any bugs,or suggestions do not hesitate to send a mail to y.k.ibnelwalid@gmail.com.
During the off season, fake data will be added to the app.
Home Team Crest Away Team Crest
Group Stages, Matchday : 6 First Knockout round QuarterFinal SemiFinal Final Matchday :
